attributes.action: Give Tax Relief to Small, Family Businesses - The backbone of the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Reduce VAT, business rates, for small family
Businesses.
attributes.background:
Treat small, family businesses as valued assets. Help them by relieving them. Instead of turning the screw and treating them like criminals. 

If we die, the country dies. No small businesses = no community = no tax revenue for welfare, roads, hospitals.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Abolish VAT for all small businesses with a taxable turnover under £250k a year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730304
